From: "James Trahern" <4idlamo@...>

You guys might remember me. Im the whacko who posted
my loud opinion a few months ago.
Well with school finally finished I've been working on
my own novel, and for the past day or two I sat down
and started working on the fanfic I promised for
Gladiator.

Since I can't seem to figure out how to post files
onto the gladiator group, I'll give you the link to
the webspace where I've got it stuck at.
<a href="http://www.angelfire.com/rpg/zjackrum">Click
here to go to my webpage</a>
It's nothing special because I'm an English major, not
a programmer. I don't want to give too much away, but
I took the three guys I see most on the forum and used
your names for characters in the book. I hope I dont
disapoint anybody.
I mention Tom Ricket in there too. He should be happy,
because he's obtained God status!
And a late apology to Deathifier, who I saw post
yesterday, but isn't in the story yet.

Check it out and post feedback to me, or through the
forum. Thanks.
-Trahern
